Room.Name: South Oceancrest Post Office #29
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the many postal facilities available in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The need for communications is essential for a working city to prosper. The Oceancrest Post Offices will send mail to anyone you like, free of charge. If you have mail at the Post Office, type "readmail". If you'd like to send mail to someone, type "sendmail <player>" and enter your message.
